page.title: 17Richmond Hill School 1
page.content: This section of the Domesday Project has been researched and recorded by the third year pupils of this school. There are 28 pupils in our class an about 180 in the whole school.The age range is from 5 to 11, we have both infant and junior children in school. We have a school sale every year to raise money to buy things like the computer that we are writing this on. The parents' association help us a great deal in raising money too. We have a harvest festival in October and all the fruit and vegetables we bring in for that are taken to the old folks home called Park Lodge in Outgang Road. At Christmas we decorate the school and the infants have a party in school when Father Christmas comes and brings them all a present. The juniors have a disco at the Rugby Club.
